trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_SEQ_00<tab>Vrtra is overjoyed to have been reunited with his sister.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Livingway near the Drowning Brand.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Jullus at Tertium.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Atheleys at the Rostra.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>That Azdaja lives is a miracle made possible by the unique nature of the void...
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_002<tab>...Ah, yes. The aether transmitters, I shall leave with Zero. They will be of more use in the Thirteenth than in the Source.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>I've already seen Varshahn safely to Vrtra. Many would be heartbroken if their “little brother” failed to return home.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_010<tab>It should come as no surprise that Golbez has a means to travel between the moon and the star, of which we may avail ourselves shortly.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_URIANGER_000_015<tab>We have awaited your return with bated breath. As should be apparent, naught of note occurred in your absence.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MAPPINGWAY_000_020<tab>A pity there was no need to employ our combat supporters... Still, everyone is safe, and that's all that matters.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>Urianger and the Loporrits are to be commended for ensuring that the seal held fast.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ESTINIEN_000_030<tab>To think this all began with a simple treasure hunt. Gods, I could sleep for a week...

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_100<tab>Oh, welcome back, everyone! While you were away, a rent in the fabric of reality suddenly appeared! Through it, we could observe you locked in furious battle with Zeromus!

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_100_100<tab>By the time it closed up, we had seen your victory─well done, by the way─but we still couldn't breathe easy until we knew for certain you were safe and sound. And here you are, thank heavens!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_101<tab>Dare I hope Azdaja is safe too? And Zero?
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_102<tab>In a word, yes.

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_103<tab>Though we could not return Azdaja to her original form, Vrtra granted her a new vessel using one of his eyes. Her circumstances are unique, but it nevertheless gives me hope that there may be a way to save other voidsent.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_104<tab>As for Zero, she has chosen to remain in her world, and do what she can to restore it.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_105<tab>Ah, so the light of hope shines again amidst the darkness!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_106<tab>Hers is an admirable dream, and I pray that she hops and skips her way to making it reality!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MAPPINGWAY_000_107<tab>Perhaps our research into environments capable of supporting life would be of use in the Thirteenth.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_108<tab>Oho, now there's a thought!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_109<tab>A day may come when the people of the Source and the Thirteenth work hand in hand. In anticipation of this, we must accumulate even more useful technology!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_110<tab>And I must inform Jammingway as well! I spy an opportunity for the Last Dregs to expand into the void!

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_111<tab>Ah, but don't let us detain you with our cavalcade of brilliant ideas. We'll see that the gate is closed and the seal deactivated, so go home and get some rest─that includes <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, Urianger!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_URIANGER_000_112<tab>As thou dost command. Pray convey our gratitude to the watcher for his timely assistance.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_100_112<tab>'Twould seem Vrtra is preparing to depart. Come, let us descend to the Tower of Babil.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_URIANGER_000_113<tab>Upon arriving in Garlemald, 'twould be meet to inform Jullus of our mission's outcome. Let us seek him out at Tertium.

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_LIVINGWAY_000_115<tab>I suppose we'll have to rename our voidsent slaughter-bots now. A shame. The name just rolls off the tongue, doesn't it? Still, it was a joy to be of aid to the people of Etheirys again!
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MAPPINGWAY_000_120<tab>Wouldn't it be grand if we could make it possible for people to spend time in the void without protective talismans...
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_WATCHEROFMOON_000_122<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>To rekindle Light in the Thirteenth and pave the way for its restoration...<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_WATCHEROFMOON_100_122<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Her crystal helped set these events into motion, did it not? Then through you and Zero, She was able to serve a greater purpose one last time.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ALPHINAUD_000_125<tab>Ah, 'tis you. What news of your mission in the void?
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>The fact you've come all this way can only mean there've been developments. I'm all ears.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_200<tab>It cannot be overstated how invaluable Lord Fourchenault's cooperation was. We must thank him profusely.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ESTINIEN_000_205<tab>I've lost count of how many times I've come here, but it's apparently enough that the immigration officials no longer interrogate me. Small blessings, eh?
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_URIANGER_000_210<tab>Without further ado, let us tend to business.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ALPHINAUD_000_215<tab>Father has many demands on his time, but I should hope he can spare us a moment...
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ALISAIE_000_220<tab>Having been away for so long, it might be nice to stay a while. If only to set Father and Mother's minds at ease.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ATHELEYS_000_300<tab>Wait, aren't you the Scions of the Seventh Dawn? Or were, rather─I understand you've disbanded...?
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ATHELEYS_000_301<tab>An audience with Lord Fourchenault? You are in luck. The Forum has just this moment adjourned, and he is still inside with the scholarch.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ATHELEYS_000_302<tab>Please wait here while I inform them of your presence.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_303<tab>Apologies to have kept you. I trust you won't object if Scholarch Montichaigne also attends.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_304<tab>My incorrigible children... Were you not assisting with Garlemald's reconstruction?

TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_ALPHINAUD_000_305<tab>Our hosts were most insistent that we take a rest, so here we are. But more importantly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has news that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> would share with you.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MONTICHAIGNE_000_306<tab>So the threat has passed! These are glad tidings indeed.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_307<tab>Harnessing Light from the First. A technological triumph...that could have ended in catastrophic failure.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_308<tab>But let us not dwell on hypotheticals.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_309<tab>Like the aether from the Isle of Haam, you employed the Light for peaceful─albeit unanticipated─purposes.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_310<tab>“Knowledge exists to serve the greater good,” as my father was fond of saying. I'm inclined to agree─in this instance.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MONTICHAIGNE_000_312<tab>It has been established that world-ending crises in the reflections are connected to calamities in the Source.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MONTICHAIGNE_000_313<tab>As such, the strides you made in understanding the nature of and effecting a change in a reflection may one day prove vital for mankind's preservation.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MONTICHAIGNE_000_314<tab>The Forum will be eager to review your accounts thoroughly, for every drop of water serves to swell the great river of knowledge.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_MONTICHAIGNE_000_315<tab>Might we prevail upon you to prepare a comprehensive report, Y'shtola? On the subjects of the void and cross-rift travel both.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_YSHTOLA_000_316<tab>It would be my pleasure.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_317<tab>We will share these tidings with those who aided you─Kokkol Dankkol not least of all. Now, if you'll excuse us, we must be on our way.
TEXT_AKTKML106_04749_FOURCHENAULT_000_318<tab>I should be glad to speak with you both later.
